title: Bard Support
body: Ok, i have a bard support and im wondering because he has a heal, should i get ignite or keep the heal for backup?

replies.body: Regardless of who your support is, you should take Heal or Barrier.

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=69ocE7Ny,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-04-02T02:43:58.357+0000)
>
> or cleanse.

Cleanse can be worth it sometimes, but in most scenarios Heal or Barrier are better.
Keep the heal, don't know who takes ignite on adc? if anyone should be support.
